nodes.text: The rat hammer was a battered white pipe owned by Bansee, the Third Girl of the White Worms who had earned her rank by proficiency in hunting rats. Bansee was carrying the pipe in Coronet City on the planet Corellia in the year 13 BBY around the time that the scrumrat Han fled from the gang.
The rat hammer first appeared in the 2018 film Solo: A Star Wars Story. It was first identified in the accompanying Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide, written by Pablo Hidalgo.
